text: Oh awesome, I've heard really great things about that course. An alumni from my old uni (University of Hertfordshire) guest lectures there, his name is Josh Parks. He's always raving about it. Ah yes, 3D, can sometimes be a bit of a tricky one to get used to if you've only ever worked in 2D before. So are you creating the orb within Maya and then rendering it? Or are you doing it all in Nuke?
Feel free to send your WIP if you'd like some feedback :smile:
Also ask away if you have any questions about industry life etc!
